Sentencas: Plant characteristics of a system containing a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) cycle on the top of a Rankine cycle were investigated.
Titulo: Plant characteristics of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell cycle and a steam cycle

Sentencas: A desulfurization reactor removes the sulfur content in the fuel, while a pre-reformer broke down the heavier hydrocarbons in an adiabatic steam reformer (ASR).
Titulo: Plant characteristics of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell cycle and a steam cycle

Sentencas: The pre-treated fuel then entered to the anode side of the SOFC.
Titulo: Plant characteristics of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell cycle and a steam cycle

Sentencas: The remaining fuels after the SOFC stacks entered a catalytic burner for further combusting.
Titulo: Plant characteristics of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell cycle and a steam cycle

Sentencas: The burned gases from the burner were then used to produce steam for the Rankine cycle in a heat recovery steam generator (HRSG).
Titulo: Plant characteristics of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell cycle and a steam cycle

Sentencas: The remaining energy of the off-gases was recycled back to the topping cycle for further utilization.
Titulo: Plant characteristics of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell cycle and a steam cycle

Sentencas: Several parameter studies were carried out to investigate the sensitivity of the suggested plant.
Titulo: Plant characteristics of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell cycle and a steam cycle

Sentencas: It was shown that the operation temperature of the desulfurization and the pre-reformer had no effect on the plant efficiency, which was also true when decreasing the anode temperature.
Titulo: Plant characteristics of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell cycle and a steam cycle

Sentencas: However, increasing the cathode temperature had a significant effect on the plant efficiency.
Titulo: Plant characteristics of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell cycle and a steam cycle

Sentencas: In addition, decreasing the SOFC utilization factor from 0.8 to 0.7, increases the plant efficiency by about 6%.
Titulo: Plant characteristics of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell cycle and a steam cycle

Sentencas: An optimal plant efficiency of about 71% was achieved by optimizing the plant.
Titulo: Plant characteristics of an integrated solid oxide fuel cell cycle and a steam cycle
